original_title: Sem Titulo #4: Apesar dos Pesares, na Chuva h√° de Cantares
overview: It rains; but still, it sings. Under the symbolic motto of the meteorological metaphor, a poetic constellation of edited "found footage" with excerpts of 99 films and 8 versions of a song. From the series "Notes for a Self-Biopic (in Regress)".
title: Untitled #4: In Spite of Ruin, Sing in the Rain
